courses.name: Javascript Engineering
courses.overview: Learn full-stack web development and build fully functional, scalable progressive web apps. In this program, the classroom becomes a simulated work environment where you will gain real-world experience collaborating with a team on Agile development projects. Learn to work smarter, not harder, using AI tools to speed up your development process and become a more efficient software developer.
courses.techstack: HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, GIT, GITHUB, VISUAL STUDIO, FIGMA, ADVANCED JAVASCRIPT, REACT, VUE, ALPHINE, SVELT, TYPESCRIPT

financing.description: Apply for a income share agreement with our partner ChancenSA at low interest rates
Spread the cost over monthly payments for greater flexibility

Application Process.step 1: Pay R500 registration fee, and complete the registration fee
Application Process.step 2: Once the registration has been successful you shall receive an email on your bootcamp dates for entry test and a week of assessments to see whether or not you are well suited for the program
Application Process.step 3: You shall be asked to be called for an interview on your final day of the entry bootcamp.
Application Process.step 4: Once they’ve received the signed contract, you’ll get an acceptance email with your tuition payment details.
